Articles.Content:
So my host doesn\'t provide the normal free online FTP client on its servers, instead it gives a link.

The link only allows like 500KB per file.

I got Filezilla it takes an hour to download WP and all that.

Don\'t say I limited it cause I gave it unlimited download/upload speeds.

Any way to speed this up?

So my host doesn\'t provide the normal free online FTP client on its servers, instead it gives a link.

The link only allows like 500KB per file.

I got Filezilla it takes an hour to download WP and all that.

Don\'t say I limited it cause I gave it unlimited download/upload speeds.

Any way to speed this up?

Not likely to be filezilla\'s fault that your internet connection or the site you\'re downloading from is slow.
